Condition: Cancer or non malignant condition regime indicated for
Regime: List of all drugs included in regime (including non immunotherapy medications). This is what will be placed into case contexts e.g. drug 1 + drug 2
Valid Immunotherapy: Confirm the drug is of the immunotherapy class
First line: Confirm this is a valid first line option for this indication
No prior systemic exposure: Confirm no prior sytemic treatment is required for this regime
Comments: Notes about regimes or rationales for dropping
